description: Detects tampering with the "ChannelAccess" registry key in order to change access to Windows event channel
author: frack113
name: Change Winevt Event Access Permission Via Registry
query: ((winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/[Hh][Kk][Ll][Mm]\\[Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt][Ww][Aa][Rr][Ee]\\[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Vv][Ee][Rr][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ee][Vv][Tt]\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Ss]\\.*/ AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:/.*\\[Cc][Hh][Aa][Nn][Nn][Ee][Ll][Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss]/ AND winlog.event_data.Details:(/.*\([Aa]\;\;0[Xx]1\;\;\;[Ss][Yy]\).*/ OR /.*\([Aa]\;\;0[Xx]5\;\;\;[Bb][Aa]\).*/ OR /.*\([Aa]\;\;0[Xx]1\;\;\;[Ll][Aa]\).*/)) AND (NOT ((process.executable:/[Cc]\:\\[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\\[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ii][Nn][Gg]\\[Tt][Rr][Uu][Ss][Tt][Ee][Dd][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Ll][Ll][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) OR (process.executable:/.*\\[Tt][Ii][Ww][Oo][Rr][Kk][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/))))
